projects.title: Blue Team Splunk Log Analysis
projects.summary: Developed advanced Splunk scripts and dashboards for SIEM log analysis, threat detection, and incident investigation.
highlights: Created custom Splunk searches and SPL scripts for real-time threat detection
Developed automated dashboards for security metrics and KPI tracking
Implemented correlation rules for multi-stage attack detection
Optimized log ingestion and search performance for large-scale environments

projects.title: Computer Forensics Analysis Toolkit
projects.summary: Built digital forensics analysis framework for evidence collection, examination, and chain-of-custody documentation.
highlights: Conducted disk imaging and analysis using forensic tools (EnCase, FTK, Autopsy)
Recovered deleted files and examined file systems (NTFS, FAT32, ext4)
Analyzed browser history, cache, and user artifacts
Automated report generation for legal and compliance purposes
Documented chain-of-custody for legal proceedings

projects.title: Metasploit Exploitation Lab
projects.summary: Created proof-of-concept exploitation scenarios using Metasploit Framework for security validation and learning.
highlights: Developed custom Metasploit modules for targeted exploitation
Performed network reconnaissance and vulnerability scanning
Executed multi-stage payload delivery and exploitation chains
Documented exploitation paths and created remediation recommendations
Conducted proof-of-concept demonstrations for security weaknesses

projects.title: Arch Linux Hardened System
projects.summary: Configured and hardened minimal Arch Linux systems with security best practices and kernel hardening.
highlights: Installed minimal Arch Linux systems from scratch
Implemented kernel hardening and system security controls
Managed package management with pacman and AUR
Configured firewalls (ufw, iptables) and network services
Optimized system performance and troubleshot kernel issues
Implemented user management and file system encryption (LUKS)

projects.title: CTF Competition Challenges
projects.summary: Solved complex capture-the-flag challenges involving cryptography, reverse engineering, web exploits, and binary analysis.
highlights: Competed in regional and national CTF competitions
Solved crypto challenges and reverse-engineered binaries
Exploited web vulnerabilities and bypass security controls
Collaborated with teams to solve complex multi-part challenges
Ranked top teams in cybersecurity competitions
